amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for enforcement of the borrowing authority in the Western Area Power Administration's Transmission Infrastructure Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to pay the salary of any officer or employee to carry out section 301 of the Hoover Power Plant act of 1984 added by the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 194 (Roll no. 340).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 194 (Roll no. 340).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Fleming.
